description: This file is the entry point for client-side hydration of a Remix React application, setting up React's StrictMode and rendering the RemixBrowser component into the DOM.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: React's concurrent mode API for batching state updates before they are committed.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: React DOM method for hydrating a server-rendered React tree on the client.
